dict.string: GST (General Systems Thinking) Gerald Weinberg Systems Types operating system organ system information system stereo system respiratory system solar system What is a system? made up of components requires configuration or components coordinating principal - makes components work together function - goal or purpose Paradoxical diversity - independent components unity - components work together to achieve goal Modularity encapsulation systems that perform same purpose can be swapped systems operate in an environment General applies to lots of things (everything) Understand Human Being Head Body Arms Legs Alternate Views Skeletal System Muscular System Digestive System Nervous System Another View Physical Social Emotional Spiritual Recursive Downward every component is a system Recursive Upward every system is part of a bigger system Computer Science Applications Programming Languages Operating Systems Hardware Operating Systems Computer Architecture CPU Memory Storage Database Networks AI Problem Solving Knowledge Representations Machine Learning Human Language Processing
